Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Power Attack: May suffer -4 attack to gain +8 damage (+12 when wielding weapon w/two hands)
Punishing Kick: Successful kick attack inflicts choice of 20' push or 5' push and knocked prone (DC 21 neg) 20/dy
Quivering Palm: Unarmed strike kills 1/dy (DC 21 Fort neg)
Sipping Demon: Self gains +1 temporary HP for 1 hr from successful attack (+2 from crit; 20 temporary HP max) when Ki Pool is not empty
Steal Ki: Critical hit or reducing living foe to 0 or negative HP when Ki Pool is not empty transfers 1 Ki Point from foe to self and gives immediate +1 save vs. existing disease
Swap Places: May swap places w/adjacent ally who has same feat; ally suffers no AOO
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduces on-hand penalty by 2 and off-hand by 6

Perfect Self: Treated as outsider for magic saves
Slow Fall: Takes no damage from falling
Still Mind: +2 vs. enchantment
Magic
Magic Notes:
Abundant Step: May spend 2 Ki Points to teleport self 1200'
